about.heading: Crafting modern web experiences
about.intro: I'm an Applied Informatics student with 4 years of frontend development experience. I specialize in building modern, responsive web applications.
about.description: I develop web solutions for diverse clients - from startups to established companies. My work combines modern design with clean code and a focus on user experience.

vue.title: Vue.js SPA Development
vue.description: Implementation of modular Single Page Applications using Vue 3 Composition API with TypeScript. Type-safe architecture, Pinia state management, routing with protected routes, and REST API integration.

wordpress.title: WordPress Custom Development
wordpress.description: Development of custom WordPress themes with advanced SCSS and custom build process. Performance optimization, SEO tuning, and integration of modern JavaScript libraries.

uiux.title: UI/UX & Modern Tooling
uiux.description: Design and implementation of responsive UI components with TailwindCSS and SCSS. GSAP animations, dark/light theme switching, and setup of modern build tools (Vite, Gulp).

results.projects: successfully delivered projects of varying complexity
results.experience: years of real-world experience with commercial projects

about.resultsDescription: Improved load times by implementing lazy loading and code splitting. Created reusable component libraries reducing development time. Modern workflow with AI tools, with emphasis on code understanding.
about.currentlyDescription: I'm looking for internship opportunities or freelance work where I can bring value with my experience while learning from more experienced developers. I'm open to remote and hybrid positions.

spa.title: Single Page Applications
spa.description: Implementation of modular SPAs using Vue 3 Composition API and React. Type-safe architecture with TypeScript, Pinia state management, routing systems with protected routes, and REST API integration with error handling.

wordpress.title: WordPress Development
wordpress.description: Development of custom WordPress themes with advanced SCSS and custom build process (Gulp, Webpack). Integration of modern JavaScript libraries, performance optimization, SEO tuning, and successful WordPress site migrations.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design & Animations
uiux.description: Design and implementation of responsive UI components (PrimeVue, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap). Dark/light theme switching, advanced animations using GSAP, and creation of consistent design systems in Figma.
